DOC.brief_title: Persona Total Knee Arthroplasty Outcomes Study
DOC.detailed_description: The study design prospective , multicenter , study commercially available Persona fix bear knee implant . The study require site obtain IRB approval prior study enrollment . All potential study subject require participate Informed Consent Process . All study subject undergo preoperative clinical evaluation prior total knee arthroplasty . The post-operative clinical radiographic evaluation conduct 6 week , 6 month , 1 year , 2 , 3 , 5 , 7 , 10 year . The primary objective study obtain implant survivorship clinical outcome data commercially available Persona fix bear implant use primary total knee arthroplasty . The assessment include : implant survivorship base removal study device ; safety base incidence frequency adverse event ; clinical performance measure overall pain function , quality life data , radiographic parameter survivorship .
